text: Lisa Deanna Rinna (born July 11, 1963) is an American actress, author, fashion designer, television host and television personality. == Acting == She is best known for her roles as Billie Reed on Days of our Lives, Taylor McBride on Melrose Place, and as the host of SoapNet's Soap Talk. == Reality TV == In 2011, Rinna was a celebrity contestant on The Apprentice, where she was eliminated in the second challenge. She returned to the show for the "All- Stars" version in 2013. From 2014 to 2023, she starred on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. ==Writing== List of books Date of publication Title 2009 Rinnavation: Getting Your Best Life Ever 2010 Starlit: A Novel Lisa Rinna 2012 The Big, Fun, Sexy Sex Book ==Awards and nominations== Year Award Category Title of work Result 1994 Soap Opera Digest Award Outstanding Female Newcomer Days of Our Lives 1995 Hottest Soap Couple 2003 Daytime Emmy Awards Outstanding Talk Show Host Soap Talk 2005 2006 2007 ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American actors
title: Lisa Rinna
